short_desc: Center based program provides occupational therapy, speech and language therapy, and physical therapy for children with developmental delays under age 12
description: Center based program provides occupational therapy, speech and language therapy, and physical therapy for children with developmental delays, under age 12. Seasonal services include playgroups, classes and autism specific services. Center is open Monday-Saturday by appointment at 510-451-5800. New clients welcome. Center accepts private pay and insurance.
